com.esri.mo2.ui.menu
Class MenuManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.menu.MenuManager
public final class MenuManager
extends Object

Provides a way to construct a collection of JMenu objects using MenuDefinitions and MenuModifications defined by service providers that implement the given service provider interface. The constructor of this class will obtain all implementations of the given interface using the plugin facilities provided by Provider. It is expected that the given interface extends MenuProvider - in this way, applications can add-to and modify menus for many different dialogs and applications without there being a conflict.

Subsequently, users of this MenuManager can obtain the collection of MenuProviders via getProviders and send them appropriate data relevant to the context of the menus being created.

The constructsMenus method provides the way to build menus from the required service provider interface. Assuming the specified interface is valid, All implementations of the interface will be used in the following way. First all MenuProviders will be queried for MenuDefinitions - these will be added to a LinkedList of possible JMenu to be provided as result - the order of adding JMenus will be given by the order of plugin providers in the classpath. Secondly, once the initial LinkedList of JMenus has been created, all MenuProviders will be requested to perform any desired modifications - the MenuProvider then has the opportunity of revising the menu order as they will appear in the dialog. The final LinkedList of JMenus will be converted to an array that is returned.

Constructor Detail

MenuManager

public MenuManager(String interfaceName)
            throws IOException,
                   ClassNotFoundException,
                   ClassNotSupportedException
Constructs a MenuManager that manages MenuProviders defined by the given interfaceName. The collection of MenuProviders is determined during construction of this MenuManager.

Parameters:
interfaceName - the full class path of the MenuProvider plug-in interface
Throws:
IOException - may be thrown by Provider.getProviderObjects
ClassNotFoundException - may be thrown by Provider.getProviderObjects
ClassNotSupportedException - if interfaceName is not a strict subclass of MenuProvider
Method Detail

getProviders

public Iterator getProviders()
Obtains a read-only Iterator over the collection of MenuProviders that was created within this MenuManager's constructor

Returns:
an iterator of MenuProviders

Obtains the full class name of the interface used to construct this MenuManager

public JMenu[] constructMenus()
Constructs an array of JMenu objects using Menu Definitions and modifications defined by service providers that implement the service provider interface.
